Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
Direct Known Subclasses:
AllCaregiversController, AllPatientController, AllTreatmentController, AllUserController, ChangePasswordController, LoginController, MainWindowController, NewTreatmentController, NewUserAccountController, TreatmentController
public abstract class Controller extends Object
abstract class for the controller and permission managment

please keep in mind, that the Controller is connected to the View programmatically create(), adding your controller to your View-FXML will end in a total disaster.

    • getStage

      public javafx.stage.Stage getStage()

      Returns:
      stage if user has permissions, else null

      method to create the stage and check for the users permissions
      Returns:
      stage, null if user is not permitted
